GeneratedWaste.name: GeneratedWaste
GeneratedWaste.description: Represents the information on the waste generated in operations, the waste generated while treating end-of-life products that were sold, and so on.

CrbnEmssnScopeAlloc.description: The allocation of scope emissions that override the scope allocation defined for the waste type and the disposal type.

DisposalSiteType.description: The type of disposal site. The emissions from waste disposal are considered as scope 3 emissions when you select Offsite and as scope 1 emissions when you select Onsite.

DisposalType.description: Specifies the method used to remove waste from the environment after it has been collected and processed.

DisposedWasteQtyUnitRefId.description: The custom disposed waste quantity unit of measure that's associated with the generated waste.

DisposedWasteQuantityinTonnes.description: The quantity of disposed waste in tonnes that’s calculated based on the disposed waste quantity and disposed waste quantity unit.

EndDate.description: The date until when the waste-related data is sent for reporting.

IsHazardous.description: Indicates whether the waste material is hazardous (true) or not (false).

IsRadioactive.description: Indicates whether the waste material is radioactive (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Scope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 1 emissions from associated stationary assets for waste that’s disposed onsite.

Scope3CrbnFtprntId.description: The scope 3 carbon footprint record associated with this generated waste record. This specified record is used to aggregate scope 3 waste-related emissions and the other scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnSrcId.description: The scope 3 emissions source record associated with the waste related to non-stationary assets, such as waste related to the end-of-life treatment of sold products.

Scp3DnstrmEndLifeSoldPrdct.description: The scope 3 downstream emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products. This value is calculated based on the waste associated with scope 3 emissions source.

Scp3UpstrmWstGenInOper.description: The scope 3 upstream emissions from the waste generated in operations. This value is calculated based on the waste associated with the stationary asset environmental source that’s disposed offsite.

StartDate.description: The date from when the waste-related data is sent for reporting.

StnryAssetEnvrSrcId.description: The stationary asset environmental source record associated with the waste related to stationary assets, such as the waste generated in operations.

SuplScope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The supplemental scope 1 emissions value that’s added to the total scope 1 emissions.

SuplScp3DnstrmEndLifeSoldPrdct.description: The supplemental downstream scope 3 emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products. This value is added to the total scope 3 downstream emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products.

SuplScp3UpstrmWstGenInOper.description: The supplemental upstream scope 3 emissions from the waste generated in operations. This value is added to the total scope 3 upstream emissions from waste generated in operations.

SupplierId.description: The supplier associated with this generated waste record.

WasteFootprintId.description: The waste footprint record associated with this generated waste record. This value is used to aggregate the waste quantity and the waste-related emissions data.

WstDispoEmssnFctrId.description: The waste disposal emissions factor set record that's used to calculate emissions based on the waste type and disposal type.
